column3: You have a science test next week that's going to count for a lot of your grade. You haven't understood this unit's course material that well and you wonder how the test is going to go.
column4: During tonight's parent-teacher conference, your guardian is going to talk to your math teacher. You're not doing well in math, and you haven't told your guardian this yet.
column5: You are meeting with your teacher. To make it on-time, you just walked up two flights of stairs quickly, and feel your heart beating very rapidly.
